name: Diver Down (Marchosias6, Yovador, Alvina DR, 0ur0boss)
description:
Diver Down is a puzzle-game centered around the thematic "Abyss". It was developed in 48 hours during the Emmi-Game Jam-2023.

In Diver Down you play as a sentient diving suit, plunging in the depths of a sunk ship. During your descent, you will be threatened by cones of light coming from a giant abyssal creature outside the hull. The light is your enemy, the shadows, your ally. Use the structure of the mysterious vessel to your advantage, and trick the creature to escape each room.

Prepare yourself for the dive, for when you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you.
